text: Stanley E. Potter (April 30, 1915 - August 1962) is a Canadian canoeist who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. In 1936 he and his partner Frank Willis finished tenth in the folding K-2 10000 m event. ==References== *Stanley Potter's profile at Sports Reference.com Category:1915 births Category:1962 deaths Category:Canadian male canoeists Category:Canoeists at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic canoeists of Canada
title: Stanley Potter (canoeist)
